title: Rose
body:
by sunflowerseren

“It’s the most beautiful flowers that bear the sharpest thorns.”

In which Kim Seokjin is a reaper, tasked with transporting souls to the afterlife with a single, deadly kiss. And he has never missed a soul…until now.

title: Fated to Be
body:
by Chiisai_san, Elgliot

It was supposed to have been a simple short journey to secure a marriage, an union between the two kingdoms.

However, an unexpected attack from pirates later and Kim Taehyung finds himself held for a hefty gold ransom on the pirate ship belonging to none other than the famed pirate captain Park Jimin.

But what happens when a pirate captain and a crown prince get caught up in the twists and turns of fate?

Words: 761, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Park Jimin (BTS), Kim Taehyung | V, Kim Seokjin | Jin
  • Relationships: Kim Taehyung | V/Park Jimin, Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin, Minor or Background Relationship(s)
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Pirate, Alternate Universe - Royalty, Prince Kim Taehyung | V, Pirate Captain Park Jimin, Kidnapping, Angst with a Happy Ending, Fluff and Angst, Eventual Relationships, Eventual Smut, Eventual Torture, Torture, Homophobic Language, Period-Typical Homophobia, Historical Inaccuracy, Vmin are bad at feelings, Stockholm Syndrome, (but not really), Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Top Kim Taehyung | V, Bottom Park Jimin (BTS), (updating as we go)

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonkook
blog.title: From afar, I steal glances; if we touch hands, will I lose you?
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Wolfsbane
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JLVHZ9

by CassiaVioletBlue, softjeon

For a a few short hopeful minutes he thought that maybe he could just have Jungkook here at his place for a little while longer, maybe it would take the others a few days to find him, maybe they were busy with something else - but he was fooling himself, he knew that and when he could hear the sound of paws drumming on earth he knew that this little adventure of Jungkook’s was already over.

For a a few short hopeful minutes he thought that maybe he could just have Jungkook here at his place for a little while longer, maybe it would take the others a few days to find him, maybe they were busy with something else - but he was fooling himself, he knew that and when he could hear the sound of paws drumming on earth he knew that this little adventure of Jungkook’s was already over.

blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Fated to Be
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2UoG91W

by Chiisai_san, Elgliot

It was supposed to have been a simple short journey to secure a marriage, an union between the two kingdoms.

However, an unexpected attack from pirates later and Kim Taehyung finds himself held for a hefty gold ransom on the pirate ship belonging to none other than the famed pirate captain Park Jimin.

But what happens when a pirate captain and a crown prince get caught up in the twists and turns of fate?
